member.name: M:Telerik.Reporting.Processing.WebServiceDataSource.JsonDataContext.CanGetValue(System.String)
member.summary: Do not attempt to get value if the requested field name is the GUID of the MergedDataNode eval key. TODO: Consider inheriting from another context which excludes certain fields, in case we add another fieldName like MergedDataNode. We cannot use FieldsDataContext because it enforces using fields from a predefined set, and JsonDataObjects might not contain all the fields in every member.
member.returns: False if the field name is the EvalKey's GUID. Otherwise, true.
